original_title: SL Rupee further depreciates against USD
original_body_lines: The Sri Lankan Rupee (LKR) has depreciated against the US Dollar (USD) today for the fourth consecutive day and today's buying rate of USD is Rs. 329.02 while the selling rate is Rs. 346.33.
Yesterday's buying rate of USD was 327.59 while the selling rate was Rs. 344.66.
The Rupee has been appreciating against the USD since earlier this month, but the Rupee continue to depreciate against the USD since last Friday.
